tool_description: This API checks URLs to see whether they are known phishing attempts.
name: Exerra phishing check
title: Exerra phishing check

api_list.name: Get all
api_list.description:
Get all domains or links associated with phishing attempts. The response is very large (>≈14 MB for domains and >≈82 MB for domains), so it is preferred to use "Check a link". 

Due to the large response size (and processing) this endpoint is paid.

api_list.name: Get stats
api_list.description: Get statistics about the Exerra Phishing API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exerra-phishing-check.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exerra-phishing-check.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exerra-phishing-check.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exerra-phishing-check.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check a URL
api_list.description: Check if a URL is a known phishing attempt

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
This is the URL that the API will check.
Must be a valid HTTP(s) URL or it will throw a 400
